alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Cimarron; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 28 at 2:39AM CST until February 28 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF THE OKLAHOMA AND TEXAS PANHANDLES... * Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron...Texas and Beaver. In Texas...Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Ochiltree...Lipscomb... Hartley...Moore...Hutchinson...Roberts...Hemphill...Carson... Gray...Wheeler...Donley and Collingsworth. * 20 Foot Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Red Flag Threat Index...3 to 6. * Timing...10 AM through 8 PM CST Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid activities that promote open flames and sparks.
